We will offer flexible check in / out times when possible but we need time between guests for a thorough cleaning.  - We always provide fresh bath towels - The beds will be made with fresh linens - The place will be clean (please leave your shoes near the door) - Feel free to use the fridge, microwave, toaster oven, dishwasher and stove - We are happy to provide directions / activities - It is a relaxed / informal setting, come as you are!
